data.name: Waifu Uncovered - Exposed DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC, will unlock all unlockables for Waifu Uncovered.

Notice that these have been created to be unlocked via gameplay. However we're aware not all players have the same level of skill or time to master the game. This DLC might save a few hours as you have access to everything.
However it adds the ability to continue playing after losing a life.

What is exactly unlocking?

This is:

- Unlocks all waifu galleries.
- Unlocks all uncensor modes.
- Unlocks all player ships.
- Unlocks one hand mode.
- By request, it unlocks beginner mode. It's slightly easier than Standard, which we already consider very playable. This mode doesn't add anything new to the game.

New feature:

You will get 2 CREDITS A.K.A shared lives when starting a new game*. This means that when you die, you can carry on playing but score will be lost.
*Credits not available in "One Hand Mode".

This is NOT an achievement unlocker, you still need to play to get the achievements.

data.short_description: This DLC, unlocks all unlockables (usually accomplished by playing) contents in "Waifu Uncovered".
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bits
  • Processor: Dual Core @ 2.4GHz (64bit)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7540HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible.
  • Additional Notes: It might run in lowers specs.
